original_text: Later, Samson went to visit his wife at the time of the wheat harvest. He took a young goat with him as a gift. He said to her father, ‘I am going into my wife's room to sleep with her.’ But her father stopped him.
korean_text: 얼마 후 밀 거둘 때에 삼손이 염소 새끼를 가지고 그의 아내에게로 찾아 가서 이르되 내가 방에 들어가 내 아내를 보고자 하노라 하니 장인이 들어오지 못하게 하고

sentences.original_text: Later, Samson went to visit his wife
sentences.korean_translation: 나중에 삼손이 그의 아내를 만나러 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: at the time of the wheat harvest
He took a young goat with him as a gift
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 선물로 어린 염소 한 마리를 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: I am going into my wife's room to sleep with her
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아내의 방에 들어가 그녀와 함께 잘 것입니다
